title: Pixel 4a rear camera capturing foggy video and that impact coming after 1 minute
content:
As of now i have taken a replacement device from flipkart and try to do a factory reset , but no luck. facing same issue after uninstalling the latest camera update as well.

Placed here a gdrive link describing this issue , please help me on this
